Question: Anakin battled Kenobi on the site of a volcano and was badly wounded, but was then reborn as this person.
Hints: Desperate to save his wife, Anakin pledges himself as Sith apprentice this person.
Palpatine sends this person to kill everyone inside the Jedi Temple, and then to assassinate the Separatist leaders on Mustafar.
In 2010, IGN ranked this person 25th in the "Top 100 Videogames Villains".
